passage_text: 1 A composite deck can cost $25-$70 or more a square foot, or $8,000-$22,400 for 16'x20', depending on the brand, project complexity and whether construction is done by casual labor or a licensed contractor.

Overall costs, depending on the tradespeople you use, the size of the deck and the type of materials will range from perhaps £25 per square metre from DIY decking using budget wood through to £100+ per square metre for a professional installation using premium materials. There are various types of decking.

Get an INSTANT estimate of the cost to Install Wood Decking! Our free calculator uses recent, trusted data to estimate costs for your Wood Decking Installation project. For a basic 120 square feet project in zip code 47474, the benchmark cost to Install Wood Decking ranges between $7.95 - $10.84 per square foot* . To estimate costs for your project: 1. Set Project Zip Code Enter the Zip Code for the location where labor is hired and materials purchased.

1 The total project cost for a Trex deck will be from $1,500 to $2,200 for a 250-square-foot deck. 2  Trex Select of basic quality averages approximately $7 per square foot. 3  Trex Enhance of higher quality is approximately $8 per square foot. 4  Trex Transcend, the highest grade, ranges between $9 and $9.50

1 Materials cost $10-$30 or more a square foot, depending on the brand and style, or $3,200-$9,600 for 16'x20'. 2  CostHelper readers report spending $8,000-$11,500 on DIY materials for a composite deck, roughly $13.91-$28.57 a square foot, with an average of $19.34.

1 Wood is the most traditional, common and easily available material for decks; it is typically easier to work with than composite materials. 2  Composite deck installation can cost $25-$70 or more a square foot (8,000 -$22,400 for 16'x20).
